About Us

We are a group of developers who are passionate about the web.

  • The Fore-front of Design & Technology

    We use the latest design and development trends in order to provide you with a modern website or app. Our developers are always learning about new technologies and how they can be incorporated into our projects.

    Find out more about our services.

  • User Centric Design

    We take great pride in building web solutions that are designed with the end user in mind. We never let aesthetics get in the way of functionality and always align our design plans with your business goals.

    Find out more about our services.

  • Full Stack Development

    At Web Magnetic, LLC. we are capable of deploying your finished product to any hosting provider or, if your application requires it, we can build and provision a cloud server for your project.

    Find out more about our services.

Web Apps

We are experts in building and maintaining custom PHP web applications using the Laravel Framework.

Wordpress

If you need custom Wordpress solutions we can build full sites or custom plugins that meet your business needs.

Mobile Apps

We build mobile applications using the Ionic Framework and deploy them to the iOS and Android platforms.

Email Marketing

We have extensive experience in building HTML email campaigns and deploying them through Mailchimp, Constant Contact, and Campaign Monitor.

Static Websites

If you need a website but don't plan on updating content very frequently or writing blog posts then the solution may be a well designed static website.

E-Commerce

A well planned e-commerce website is essential to your businesses success when selling products or services online.

Responsive Web Development

At Web Magnetic, LLC. we understand that over 80% of all users are accessing the internet through mobile browsers. If your website is not optimized for mobile browsers you will likely see higher bounce rates as more and more users access your site from mobile devices.

Also there is the possibility that your non-mobile-friendly website is affecting your Google ranking if potential customers are searching from their mobile devices.

At Web Magnetic, LLC. we implement a mobile first approach with all of our projects to ensure your website will be optimized for your users across all devices.

Contact us today to learn more about our services
